title: My pre-season ( blue essence and skin shard missions) disappeared
body: So today was the update, I logged in checked I had missions for around 40 k blue essence and 2 epic skin shards, I couldn't play since I had to leave for work and right now when  I came back and checked them they're gone ? Please help me out with this

replies.body: Sorry for the late reply, My missions were gone but when I played a game after the victory screen I still got my rewards.

Hey it looks like you already completed the missions.  You can obtain your BE via the hextech crafting menu and opening the capsules.  The epic skins are also not shards, so it will automatically be unlocked on the account.  :D

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aapc5jdP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-08T19:22:56.523+0000)
>

Same here... I had like 140k now I'm at 9k????
